mapper.select: select goods_no as goodsNo, code, goods_type as goodsType, goods_name as goodsName, goods_scope as goodsScope, goods_filename as goodsFilename, goods_filepath as goodsFilepath, goods_tag as goodsTag from goods where goods_type=#{type} and viewstatus=0

select goods_no as goodsNo, code, goods_type as goodsType, goods_name as goodsName, goods_scope as goodsScope, goods_filename as goodsFilename, goods_filepath as goodsFilepath, goods_tag as goodsTag from (select rownum as rnum, g.* from (select * from goods where goods_type=#{goodsType} and viewstatus=0 order by goods_no) g) where (rnum between #{start} and #{end}) order by rnum desc

select goods_no as goodsNo, code, goods_type as goodsType, goods_name as goodsName, goods_price as goodsPrice, goods_scope as goodsScope, goods_content as goodsContent, goods_filepath as goodsFilepath, goods_tag as goodsTag from goods where goods_no=#{goodsNo}
